title: How to play Thief 1 Fan Missions
content: I got a problem on how to start a fan mission for thief 1, (not gold), I got the convict.osm file for thief 1, and install a fan mission by using darkloader, but every time i start the game, the game exits automatically. I own Thief 1 & 2 from the bundle pack, and please tell me how to load fan missions for Thief 1. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] eg
